title: Looking for More 1910-12 SC Pins (Large Letter Variations)
author: taul166

posts.post_title: Looking for More 1910-12 SC Pins (Large Letter Variations)
posts.post_content:
Hi, some of you members have helped me acquire some Large Letter variations.
I may double back to some of you to see what additional pins you may have for sale.

Since my original post, if others have any for sale, send me an email or PM and we can discuss any you have and which ones I am looking for.  Either graded or raw are fine. 
Thanks.
